title: I can't sign up for a PBE account
body:
A new wave of PBE accounts will be given to us and I've tried to get one for years. Now, I went ahead onto the PBE sign up page trying to log in to verify my account. I log in, but it doesn't change anything. It still says I have to log in to verify my account. 

My account should be eligable. I am honor level 4 and I have not been banned. 

Does my application from last time still count? Am I doing something wrong?

Please help :Â´(

replies.body: I had the same, i've just been spamming f5 and retrying for over a hour but at some point I finally got lucky ^^

We've been having some issues with the signup page being overloaded and not working for everyone quite yet. Once you're logged in and submit your details, you should either be able to create your account or get an error saying "Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again". 

If you get the "Please refresh" message, it just means the page is still flooded with other players smashing that button. The signup page will catch up eventually, and sadly we just need to be patient while it processes everyone. 

If the page isn't letting you sign in correctly, try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps, but let me know if it doesn't!

Please help. I have been waiting for around 3 years for this and am very sad that it is not working. I have tried using a different browser all together and still will not work. I am doing this at 3 in the morning, and much later after the huge wave of people have tried to create one at the same time, making it hard to believe that the only problem is that there are multiple people hitting the 'sign me up' button at once. I would really appreciate some help on this issue as soon as possible. Thank you.
It finally worked. Thank you for your effort!
I just flat out tried it on a completely different browser. Didn't work though so I guess i'll try it tomorrow. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
If it doesnt work in time to where the sign ups go away and I dont get an acct. will riot still hook me up? or am i out of luck for waiting for years?....
I've been trying for a long time, but still no luck... Especially since the honor resets soon and I would like to actually get on the PBE.  PLEASE HELP!
It dosnt let me in its says you have wrong password but its corekt ??? why  :(((((((((
I hope riot gives some sort of announcement pertaining to this ordeal. I've been trying every hour today so far with no luck. I've even sent in a ticket but got no response so far.
Did you get a response yet?

I have gotten a response. They said people couldn't sign up because everyone was smashing the sign up button way too much. They told me that they are currently working on it and that it should be fixed in some ways but not completely. I was able to make an account on the PBE and am now playing on it.

Edit: If you're getting the message "Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again." That's the same message I was getting but I kept trying and trying until finally my information went through and I was able to create an account. If anyone is still getting that message, all I can say is to keep trying. Eventually you should be able to create an account.

Same here I keep on getting that exact same message and im not banned or either level three of honor :(
"Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again". Please do say when this will be fixed on this discussion. 
Thank you for your time..
I've been trying for 2 days to sign up but it keeps giving me the "something went wrong. Please refresh and try again" message.
